title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 70.2 - Legal base
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 70.2 - Legal base

State Regulations

The Mental Hygiene Law, section 13.03, authorizes the
commissioner to adopt regulations establishing classes of operating
certificates. Section 13.01 sets forth the applicability of and exceptions to
the general requirements for operating certificates. Section 1.05 sets forth
the statutory definitions of terms used in this Part. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14
ยง
70.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
